stories.title: Install Ubuntu on WSL2 on Windows 11 with GUI Support

stories.text:
I'm an early engineer at a startup and trying to select a law firm to work with for an O-1 visa. I've chatted with PassRight (https://www.passright.com/) and Bay Immigration Law (https://bayimmigrationlaw.com/). They both have legit online reviews, but I'd really love to chat with someone who has worked with either and ask about their experiences.

Thanks! :)
stories.title: Ask HN: Using PassRight or Bay Immigration Law for O-1?

stories.text:
The word cookie is misleading in explaining to the general public audience about what is really happening in Martech and Adtech about their data. By using the work "tracker" or "tracer", it would be more transparent for users about their consent on accepting being tracked/traced for ads or performance purposes. What do you think?

Edit : "Do you accept our cookies" would be "Do you accept our tracers/trackers"
stories.title: Ask HN: Replacing the word “Cookie” by “Tracer/Tracker” in banners

stories.text: If I provide them with data to power their Zero Click Search, I'm effectively cutting my web traffic to zero. This does not seem fair.
